apiChineseName: 淘宝客-推广者-全量维权退款订单查询

applyScopes.name: 淘宝客【推广者】推广订单及数据查询

description: 淘宝客账户下全量维权退款订单查询

labels.tips: 不需要用户授权，就能获取到数据

name: taobao.tbk.order.refund.get

publicParams.description: 用户登录授权成功后，TOP颁发给应用的授权信息，详细介绍请点击这里。当此API的标签上注明：“需要授权”，则此参数必传；“不需要授权”，则此参数不需要传；“可选授权”，则此参数为可选
publicParams.name: session

publicParams.description: 时间戳，格式为yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss，时区为GMT+8，例如：2015-01-01 12:00:00。淘宝API服务端允许客户端请求最大时间误差为10分钟
publicParams.name: timestamp

publicParams.description: 签名的摘要算法，可选值为：hmac，md5，hmac-sha256。
publicParams.name: sign_method

publicParams.description: API输入参数签名结果，签名算法介绍请点击这里
publicParams.name: sign

publicParams.description: 响应格式。默认为xml格式，可选值：xml，json。
publicParams.name: format

publicParams.description: 是否采用精简JSON返回格式，仅当format=json时有效，默认值为：false
publicParams.name: simplify

publicResponseParams.description: 平台颁发的每次请求访问的唯一标识
publicResponseParams.name: request_id

publicResponseParams.description: 请求访问失败时返回的根节点
publicResponseParams.name: error_response

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误码
publicResponseParams.name: code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误码
publicResponseParams.name: sub_code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: sub_msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求成功返回的根节点，'***' 为API名称的下划线模式
publicResponseParams.name: ***_response

requestParams.description: 全量维权订单查询入参
requestParams.name: publisher_refund_order_query_option

subParams.description: 跳转类型，当向前或者向后翻页必须提供,-1: 向前翻页,1：向后翻页
subParams.name: jump_type

subParams.description: 1-维权发起时间，2-订单结算时间（正向订单），3-维权完成时间，4-订单创建时间，5-订单更新时间 （注意：入参startTime小于2022年12月20日0点时，query_type只能为1、2、3；入参startTime大于等于2022年12月20日0点时，query_type可以为1、2、3、4、5)
subParams.name: query_type

subParams.description: 位点，除第一页之外，都需要传递；前端原样返回。
subParams.name: position_index

subParams.description: 1 表示2方，2表示3方，4表示不限
subParams.name: member_type

subParams.description: 维权编号，是当前订单发生维权退款的编号，非淘宝订单编号，如订单发生多次维权，则会产生多个维权编号
subParams.name: refund_suit_id

subParams.description: 淘宝父订单编号(买家在淘宝后台显示的订单编号)
subParams.name: tb_trade_parent_id

subParams.demoValue: zf测试商品003商品，测试请不要拍
subParams.name: item_title

subParams.description: 维权创建(淘客结算回执) 4, 维权成功(淘客结算回执) 2, 维权失败(淘客结算回执) 3, 发生多次维权，待处理 11, 从淘客处补扣（钱已结给淘客） 等待扣款 12, 从淘客处补扣（钱已结给淘客） 扣款成功 13, 从卖家处补扣（钱已结给卖家） 等待扣款 14, 从卖家处补扣（钱已结给卖家） 扣款成功 15
subParams.name: refund_status

subParams.description: 结算金额(订单确认收货后的成交金额）
subParams.name: tb_trade_finish_price

subParams.description: 维权金额(买家申请维权退款的金额)
subParams.name: refund_fee

subParams.description: 结算预估收入=结算金额*提成。以订单确认收货后的成交金额为基数，预估您可能获得的收入。
subParams.name: pub_share_fee

subParams.description: 应退还佣金(不含技术服务费和渠道专项服务费)
subParams.name: tk_commission_fee_refund

subParams.description: 应退还补贴(不含技术服务费和渠道专项服务费)
subParams.name: tk_subsidy_fee_refund

subParams.description: 应退还佣金对应的技术服务费
subParams.name: tk_commission_alimm_refund_fee

subParams.description: 应退还补贴对应的技术服务费
subParams.name: tk_subsidy_alimm_refund_fee

subParams.description: 应退还佣金对应的渠道专项服务费
subParams.name: tk_commission_agent_refund_fee

subParams.description: 应退还补贴对应的渠道专项服务费
subParams.name: tk_subsidy_agent_refund_fee

subParams.description: 应退还预估收入：订单发生维权退款应退还的预估收入（佣金+补贴，含技术服务费和渠道专项服务费）
subParams.name: show_return_fee

responseParams.description: 接口返回值信息，跟rpc架构保持一致
responseParams.name: result_code

sdkDemos.descprition:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import top.api

req=top.api.TbkOrderRefundGetRequest(url,port)
req.set_app_info(top.appinfo(appkey,secret))

req.publisher_refund_order_query_option="数据结构示例JSON格式"
try:
	resp= req.getResponse()
	print(resp)
except Exception,e:
	print(e)

NodeJS
C/C++

sdkDemos.descprition:
from datetime import datetime
from topsdk.client import TopApiClient,TopException
from topsdk.ability414.ability414 import Ability414
from topsdk.ability414.request.taobao_tbk_order_refund_get_request import *

if __name__ == '__main__':
    # create Client
    client = TopApiClient(appkey='<your-appkey>', app_sercet='<your-appsecret>', top_gateway_url='<top-gateway-url>',verify_ssl=False)
    ability = Ability414(client=client)

    # create domain
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption = TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption()
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.jump_type = 1
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.order_scene = 1
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.page_size = 1
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.query_type = 1
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.page_no = 0
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.position_index = '2222_334666'
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.start_time = '2022-12-23 12:28:22'
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.member_type = 1
    taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption.end_time = '2022-12-23 13:28:22'

    # create request
    request = TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetRequest()
    request.publisher_refund_order_query_option = taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption
    try:
        response = ability.taobao_tbk_order_refund_get(request)
        print(response)
    except TopException as e:
        print(e)
sdkDemos.name: Python3
GO

sdkDemos.descprition:
<?php
require "../vendor/autoload.php";
use Topsdk\Topapi\TopApiClient;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Request\TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetRequest;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Ability414;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Ability414\Domain\TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption;


// create Client
$client = new TopApiClient("<your-appkey>","<your-appsecret>","<top-gateway-url>");
$ability = new Ability414($client);

// create domain
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption = new TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption();
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setJumpType(1);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setOrderScene(1);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setPageSize(1);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setQueryType(1);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setPageNo(0);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setPositionIndex("2222_334666");
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setStartTime("2022-12-23 12:28:22");
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setMemberType(1);
$taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption->setEndTime("2022-12-23 13:28:22");

// create request
$request = new TaobaoTbkOrderRefundGetRequest();
$request->setPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption(taobaoTbkOrderRefundGetPublisherRefundOrderQueryOption);

$response = $ability->taobaoTbkOrderRefundGet($request);
var_dump($response);
